product_name: The North Face Red Blaze Vest - Men's
long_description: The North Face Red Blaze vest features exceptionally warm PrimaLoft(R) Eco insulation for fun in the snow, and zip-in compatibility with shells on cold, wet days. Ultra-warm, soft PrimaLoft(R) Eco is made from post-consumer recycled polyester; it feels like down yet continues to insulate even if wet, and dries quickly, too. Zips into complementary garments from The North Face. The North Face Red Blaze vest features a zippered chest pocket; two zippered hand pockets. Vest stows in hand pocket. Elastic binding at cuffs; hem cinch-cord.
short_description: The North Face Red Blaze vest features exceptionally warm PrimaLoft(R) Eco insulation for fun in the snow, and zip-in compatibility with shells on cold, wet days.
